name: RYAN_WHITE_TST_SCREENING
description: Holds data for Ryan White CAREWare TST Screenings.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RW_TST_RESULT_C_NAME
columns.description: The result of the TST screening.
entries: Client did not return for reading

columns.name: RW_TST_SCORE
columns.description: The numerical score of the TST screening.

columns.name: RW_TST_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The action corresponding to the TST screening.
entries: Prophylaxis or treatment not medically indicated

columns.name: RW_TST_COMMENTS
columns.description: The comments for the TST screening.
